puzzle.title: Cribbage
puzzle.hint: Remember: pone (non-dealer) counts first, but dealer gets the crib. All face cards are value 10, and aces are value 1 & never high!
This Cribbage scoring chart may be helpful: <http://cribbage.wordpress.com/2008/06/11/cribbage-scoring-aid/>

Here are all the card combinations you should score in each hand:
| Bill's hand | Ted's hand | |--------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------| | 3 of Kind + Pair | Crib is His Nobs | | (Hand is pair)+(Crib is 15 + His Nobs) | seven 15s + 3 of Kind + Pair | | His Nobs | (Hand is 15 + flush) + (Crib is 15 + Double Run) | | (hand is double run + two 15s) + (Crib is 15) | Double run + His Nobs | | six 15s + 3 of Kind + pair | Crib is His Nobs | | (Hand is double run + a 15) + (Crib is 3-card run) | double double run + two 15s | | His Nobs | (Hand is one 15) + (crib is pair) | | (Hand is six 15s + 3 of kind) + (Crib is 3-card run + 2 15s) | 4-card Flush, 3-card run, single 15 | | Triple run | Hand is four-card double run + two 15s | | (Hand is three 15s) + (Crib is double run + two 15s) | 3-card run + two 15s | | Double run + His nobs | (Hand is 5-card run + 2 15s) + (Crib is 3-card run) | | Doesn't get to count! | Triple + three 15s |
The ordered letters are: HA VE AP IN TA TM AD IS ON GR IL L
The solution tells you to: have a pint at MADISON GRILL
